document_data.name: Hallix
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hallixes''' were a family based in [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Activities: Like other wealthy Neverwintan families, the Hallixes maintained a [[Hallix Mausoleum|family mausoleum]] in the [[Neverdeath]] [[Neverwinter/Neverdeath#Main Graveyard|Main Graveyard]]. This mausoleum contained a secret connection to the [[Waterclock Guild's Crypts|crypts]] of the [[Waterclock Guild]].
document_data.History:
The family had been living and burying its dead in Neverwinter for a long time prior to the [[eruption of Mount Hotenow]] in the mid–15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Six members of the family died following that eruption.

Within forty years, the family mausoleum would become home to a cult dedicated to [[Vecna]], and the remains of the Hallix family interred there were consumed by the cult's [[ghoul]]s.
